gametext: Deploy on table. Non-lightsaber weapons carried by your non-Jedi characters may not be stolen. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site you control with a non-[Permanent Weapon] blaster present. Rebel Artillery is a Lost Interrupt. [Immune to Alter]
lore: "I've been looking forward to this for a long time." "Yes, I'll bet you have." Han abruptly ended his conversation with Greedo and flipped Wuher a credit to pay for the cleanup.
name: A Good Blaster At Your Side

gametext: Power +1 for each of opponent's characters here. When with two of your aliens (or clones), adds one battle destiny. May not be targeted by weapons unless each of your other aliens and clones present are 'hit.' Immune to You Are Beaten and attrition < 5.
lore: Female Twi'lek.
name: Aayla Secura

gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, and 4 vehicles. Adds 1 to attrition against opponent here for each piloted [Republic] starship here. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Concussion Missles may deploy aboard.
name: Acclamator-Class Assault Ship

gametext: USED: Cancel Sense. LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Uttini Effect, and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. "The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded." \b OR \b0 The Force can be used to affect the things around a Jedi. "Always remember, your focus determines your reality."
name: Alter (V) (Premiere)

gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Azure Angel. Adds 2 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Players may initiate battles here for free. During battle, your battle destiny draws and Anakin's weapon destiny draws are +1. Immune to attrition < 4.
name: Anakin Skywalker, Padawan Learner

gametext: Deploy on table with any number of Defensive Shields from outside your deck face down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Uncertain Is The Future until the end of your first turn.
lore: "The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight."
name: Anger, Fear, Aggression (V)

gametext: For remainder of turn, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon and opponent's starship weapon destiny draws are -1. OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) aboard your starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: As their war with the Empire continued, Rebel pilots learned ways to counter standard Imperial tactics such as the Tallon Roll.
name: Antilles Maneuver (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Independant] starships are defense value +2 at Bespin locations. Once per game, if Quiet Mining Colony on table, may simultaneously deploy a unique (*) [Independent] starfighter and matching pilot (for -1 Force each) from your hand and/or Reserve Deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Alter.]
lore: Symbol for the Cloud City Miner's Guild (not affiliated with the Galactic Miner's Guild). Named after the beldons, giant creatures who generate Tibanna gas.
name: Beldon's Eye (V)

gametext: Deploy on your Republic warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.
lore: BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Standard issue for Imperial forces. So numerous that many have been stolen by Rebels. Extendable stock. Carries energy for 100 shots.
name: Blaster Rifle (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot is (*]Booster, who provides ability of 3. Once per game, may deploy Mirax here from reserve deck; reshuffle. Immune to Lateral Damage and attrition < 5.
lore: Owned by legendary Terrik family of smugglers. Used to chase down the pirates who killed Wedge's parents. On Corellian Security's most wanted list. 37.5 meters long.
name: Booster In Pulsar Skate

gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 4. May add 1 astromech. During battle, may target a starship with no character piloting. Draw destiny. If destiny > defense value, target hit. Immune to attrition < 3.
lore: Flown by an unknown pilot who likes to spin a lot. Played the deciding role in the attack against the Droid Control Ship.
name: Bravo Fighter (V)

gametext: Your clones deploy -1 here. While at an [Episode I] battleground site, adds one battle destiny. Permanent weapon is (*]Twin Blasters (may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit and forfeit -3 if total destiny -2 > defense value).
lore: \b Leader\b0 . Clone Trooper.
name: Captain Rex, 501st Legion

gametext: Artillery weapons here are 'powered.' Permanent weapon is Blaster Cannon (may target a character, creature, or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free; draw destiny: target 'hit,' and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
lore: \b Scout.\b0
name: Captain Yutani With Blaster Cannon

gametext: If your starting location was a system, deploy a related site (must be a battleground if the system is a non-battleground or Endor) with < 3 [LS] icons and up to three Effects that are always [Immune to Alter] from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.
lore: Alliance troops on planet must plan ahead to achieve success in military operations.
name: Careful Planning (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting \ul Falcon\ul0, it is maneuver +2, Chewie draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise, and your battle destiny draws (and total battle destiny) at same system may not be modified, canceled or reset by opponent.
lore: Loyal Wookiee companion of Captain Han Solo. Co-pilot of the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0. Leia referred to him as a "walking carpet."
name: Chewie (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. You may not play Rebel Barrier. Senators are deploy +2. Whenever you initiate a battle, may retrieve your topmost non-[permanent], non-[maintenance] character. May place the top card of your Reserve Deck in Lost Pile to place a combat card in owner's Lost Pile. [Immune to Alter.]
lore: "Attention. This is Lando Calrissian. The Empire has taken control of the city. I advise everyone to leave before more Imperial troops arrive."
name: Civil Disorder (V)

gametext: Deploys -1 to same site as Obi-Wan. [Separatist] cards are power and defense value -1 here. When in battle at a site with Rex (or two of your clones), may cancel one just drawn battle destiny.
lore: \b Leader\b0 . Clone Trooper.
name: Commander Cody

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting Rogue 1, it is maneuver +2 and Luke draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During your control phase, may use 1 Force to take a speeder or a card with "T-47" in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 3.
lore: Hero of Yavin. Promoted to Commander in his third year of military training with the Alliance. Squadron flight \b leader\b0  at Echo Base during the Battle of Hoth.
name: Commander Luke Skywalker (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. Once per turn, if you just deployed a Rogue Squadron pilot to same or related site, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Attrition against opponent is +1 here.
lore: Rogue squadron \b leader\b0 .
name: Commander Narra

dark_side_text: Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.
gametext: Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.\par Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.
light_side_text: Your characters here are defense value -1 and may not be excluded from battle.
name: Coruscant: Night Club

gametext: \ul If in hand, may place her under Reserve Deck. \ul0 May be targeted instead of Luke by Mind What You Have Learned (that card then targets Leia instead of Luke for remainder of game). May deploy Reflection from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: \b Scout. Leader. \b0 Made friends with Wicket. Negotiated an alliance with the Ewoks. Leia found out the truth about her father from Luke in the Ewok village.
name: Daughter Of Skywalker (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While piloting Rogue 4 (or any X-wing), draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Permanent weapon is Rogue Blaster (may target a character or creature for free: draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
lore: Defected from the Empire with Biggs Darklighter. Aided in mutiny aboard the transport \ul Rand Ecliptic\ul0 . Served in the \ul Ecliptic\ul0  Evaders. Luke's wingman at the Battle of Hoth.
name: Derek 'Hobbie' Klivian (V)

gametext: USED: Use 1 Force to deploy an Effect that deploys for free on table (or your side of table) and is always [Immune to Alter] from reserve deck. STARTING: When drawing your starting hand, draw up to 12 cards instead of 8. Place this interrupt in Reserve Deck.
lore: Han did not take kindly to Jabba's posturing.
name: Don't Tread On Me (V)

gametext: Once per turn, if Amidala at another location, may activate 1 Force. During your move phase, may target an opponent's Undercover spy here and draw two destiny. Choose one (take the other into hand). Target "breaks cover" if destiny +1 > ability.
lore: \b Spy \b0 and handmaiden.
name: Dorme

gametext: Deploy on table. All immunity to attrition is -3. You may not fire [Permanent] weapons. If opponent just lost a Dark Jedi or a battle, they lose 1 Force. During your draw phase, use 3 Force or place this Effect in Used Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: News of Imperial defeat inspires the citizens of the galaxy. A major loss seriously undermines the Empire's ability to function.
name: Down With The Emperor! (V)

gametext: Deploy on table; shuffle your Reserve Deck, peek at top three cards, and stack them face-up here. During battle, may take a stacked card into hand to prevent all battle destiny draws from being modified or canceled (each player may draw no more than one battle destiny). (Immune to Alter.)
lore: "Give the evacuation code signal ... and get to your transports!"
name: Evacuation Control (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Once during your control phase, if opponent occupies a non-battleground location, may peek at top two cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Before swinging across the treacherous abyss, Leia gave Luke a kiss for luck. Despite an incessant storm of laserblasts, they made it.
name: For Luck (V)

gametext: Find one of your missing characters. OR Retrieve the topmost character of your Lost Pile into hand.
lore: "I'm looking for someone." "Looking? Found someone you have I would say."
name: Found Someone You Have (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Opponent may not add destiny draws to power or attrition here. While all your ability here is provided by scouts and/or spies, adds one battle destiny and once during your turn may peek at top card of opponent's force pile.
lore: \b Leader, scout, \b0 and information broker.
name: General Airen Cracken

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. During battle, may use 1 Force to [Upload] an Interrupt, play it, then place that card out of play. Once per turn, may [Upload] a non-Interrupt card with "door" in game text.
lore: \b Scout\b0. \b Leader\b0  of the Rebel strike team on Endor. Needed the cleverness of a Corellian to destroy the Endor control bunker. Discovered the truth about Luke and Leia.
name: General Solo (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot is (*]Dutch, who provides ability of 2. Opponent may not 'react' to here and must first use 1 Force to draw a card for battle destiny here.
lore: At the Battle of Yavin, Dutch led his squadron of outdated but reliable Y-wings in the first wave of the assault against the Death Star.
name: Gold Leader In Gold 1 (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Force retrieval with Or Be Destroyed is immune to Secret Plans. While armed with a blaster, Han is defense value +2. While Or Be Destroyed on table, immune to attrition < Han's power.
lore: Corellian. Graduated with honors from the Imperial Academy. Dishonorably discharged. Wanders the galaxy building a reputation as a \b gambler\b0  and hot-shot pilot.
name: Han (V)

gametext: Deploy on Han (except TK-422), even as a 'react.' May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, its forfeit = 0, and opponent loses 1 Force if destiny +1 > defense value. Once during your control phase, may fire using 1 Force.
lore: BlasTech DL-44 heavy blaster pistol. Short range, but relatively powerful. Carries energy for 25 shots. Illegal or restricted in most systems.
name: Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. For each of opponent's non-battleground locations on table, your Force generation is +1. Once per game, may take an Immediate Effect into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: Ishi Tib accountant. Experienced administrator. Freelance consultant. Worked for many planetary governors. Knows how to get the most out of any taxation scheme.
name: Harc Seff (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Once per character, when you deploy Chewie, Lando, Leia, or Luke to a Tatooine site, may take any one card from Used Pile into hand; reshuffle. While Han is frozen, Rebels are immune to None Shall Pass. Once per game, may deploy a farm from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  (Immune to Alter.)
lore: "Jedi mod spienko eek."
name: I Must Be Allowed To Speak (V)

gametext: Cancel All Too Easy, Imperial Barrier (targeting your Jedi), Stunning Leader (where your Jedi participating), or You Are Beaten (except when canceling Uncontrollable Fury). [Immune to Sense] OR Once per game, if opponent just initiated a battle, you may take the first weapons segment action.
lore: "Obi-Wan has taught you well."
name: Impressive, Most Impressive (V)

gametext: Jabba's Prize is a Light Side card and does not count towards your deck limit. Reveal to opponent when deploying your Starting Effect. For remainder of game, you may not deploy (Maintenance Cost) \ul Falcon\ul0 .\par \par \ul Deploys only at start of game if Jabba's Prize is at Security Tower (replaces opponent's Jabba's Prize imprisoned in Security Tower); otherwise place out of play\ul0 .\par \par May not be placed in Reserve Deck. Jabba's Prize is a persona of Corran Horn only while on table. If Jabba's Prize was just released or leaves table, place it out of play. While Jabba's Prize is at Audience Chamber, opponent's battle destiny draws there are +1.
name: Jabba's Prize (V)

gametext: USED: If you just drew a character for destiny, take that card into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve a non-[maintenance] character into hand.
lore: A Jedi can adjust the force within and around an object, causing it to move as the Jedi wills.
name: Jedi Levitation (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. If your character, starship, or vehicle in battle is about to be lost (or crashed) before the damage segment, it is instead lost at end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0). [Immune to Alter].
lore: \b Dejarik\b0  of venomous swamp creature from Noe'ha'on. Keen senses of smell and vision. Dangerous hunter. Lays eggs - hundreds of ravenously hungry hatchlings.
name: K'lor'slug (V)

gametext: Once during your control phase, may use 1 Force to name a card type. Reveal top card of opponent's Reserve Deck. If that card matches the named card type, it is lost. Otherwise, replace it or move it to opponent's Used Pile. Immune to attrition < 3
lore: Leesub is a Qiraash (near-human). Enslaved as child. Limited precognition. Selected by Imperial High Inquisitor Tremayne as Force adept. Escaped and hiding in Mos Eisley.
name: Leesub Sirln (V)

gametext: While at opponent's Senate, Leia's game text may not be canceled and may lose 1 Force to place Leia and any character present out of play. During battle, may cancel game text of a leader of ability < 5 with Leia for remainder of turn.
lore: Adopted daughter of the Viceroy and First Chairman of Alderaan. Became a political \b leader\b0  at a young age. The injustices of the New Order led her to join the Rebellion.
name: Leia (V)

gametext: Deploys free to Cloud City or a site with a Scomp link. If a battle was just initiated at same site, may deploy an alien here (free if Lando) as 'react' from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May deploy Cyborg Construct on Lobot from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: Former criminal. Fitted with a cybernetic device. Now repays his debt to society by ensuring the smooth running of Cloud City. Becomes disoriented when not with a computer.
name: Lobot (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. If piloting lead starfighter, Attack Run total is +3. During your control phase, if piloting at a battleground, may take Darklighter Spin into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle or retrieve 1 Force.
lore: Son of Anakin Skywalker. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Honed piloting skills while bullseyeing womp rats in Beggar's Canyon aboard T-16 skyhopper.
name: Luke Skywalker (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 to a forest. Luke's weapon destiny draws are +1. At same site, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon. During opponent's draw phase, if alone on Endor, may retrieve 1 Force. Immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Resourceful \b scout\b0  and member of the Rebel infiltration team assembled to destroy the shield generator. Surrendered to his father so that he would not endanger the mission.
name: Luke Skywalker, Rebel Scout (V)

gametext: Deploy on Luke. Luke's power and immunity to attrition are +2. During battle at a battleground, may exchange a card in hand with an Interrupt in Lost Pile. This device lost if Luke Disarmed.
lore: Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.
name: Luke's Bionic Hand

gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, may reveal an unpiloted combat vehicle from hand to take its matching pilot character (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. May not be suspended. [Immune to Alter]
lore: Enhanced steering mechanisms on Rebel T-47s provide increased maneuverability in planetary atmospheres.
name: Maneuvering Flaps (V)

gametext: Deploys -1 to (Episode I icon) locations. If you just lost Force to opponent's Effect, may take an (Episode I icon) Interrupt (except Control) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle or place a card from hand under Credits Will Do Fine. Immune to You Are Beaten and attrition. May not be Disarmed.
lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.
name: Master Qui-Gon (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Star Cruisers (except \ul Home One\ul0) may deploy -2 (to a maximum of -3), ignore deployment restrictions in their game text, draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and are immune to attrition < 4. Capital Support is canceled. (Immune to Alter)
lore: Admiral Ackbar's hit-and-fade tactics force the Imperial Navy to spread throughout the galaxy in a futile attempt to engage the Rebels.
name: Mon Calamari Dockyards

dark_side_text: Starships piloted by bounty hunters are power +1 here. All starships may move between here and Nal Hutta as a 'react'.
gametext: Force drain +1 here. Once per game, if you control, may take Han's Toolkit into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.\par Starships piloted by bounty hunters are power +1 here. All starships may move between here and Nal Hutta as a 'react'.
light_side_text: Force drain +1 here. Once per game, if you control, may take Han's Toolkit into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
name: Nar Shaddaa

gametext: Deploys -2 (and landspeed = 2) on Tatooine. If a card was just stacked on Credits Will Do Fine, may take a non-character card into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. While at opponent's Watto's Junkyard, its Light Side game text is canceled. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Qui-Gon Jinn's Padawan. Stayed behind to protect Queen Amidala when Qui-Gon left to explore Mos Espa, but was in constant communication should he be needed.
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Padawan Learner (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot. Permanent pilot is (*]Obi-Wan, who provides ability of 6. Opponent's starships may not 'cloak'. Your total ability here may not be reduced.
lore: Optimized for diplomatic missions with sensor-proof pods that have ejection capabilities. Easily identified by its red coloration.
name: Obi-wan in Radiant VII

gametext: May add Harc as a pilot. During battle, adds one destiny to total power. If a Dark Jedi or Sith was just deployed to a related site, may deploy a related location from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4 (< 6 at Bespin).
name: Overseer

gametext: If your character or starship is about to be captured or lost during the weapons segment of a battle, it is hit instead and may not be captured or lost until the damage segment. OR If opponent just played an Interrupt during battle, activate 2 Force.
lore: Lord Vader interceded between the trigger happy mercenary and his target.
name: Put That Down (V)

gametext: \ul Destiny +1 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. \ul0 During your control phase, if with opponent's Undercover spy, opponent loses 2 force (may not be reduced). If a spy here 'breaks cover' or is lost, may place R-3PO in Used pile.
lore: Designed as a response to the threat of Imperial espionage droids. Joins a droid pool and uncovers spies. Has tattoo reading "Thank The Maker" on left posterior plating.
name: R-3PO (Ar-Threepio) (V)

gametext: May add Red Leader as pilot. X-wings are immune to Tallon Roll. Once per turn, may use 1 force to take a unique ((*]) Red Squadron X-wing (except Red 5) into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle.
lore: Lead fighter of Red Squadron at Battle of Yavin. Flown by Garven Dreis. Also served at main Rebel base on Dantooine.
name: Red 1 (V)

gametext: May deploy as a 'react.' Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When deployed (except as a 'react'), may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect (as if from hand).
lore: X-wing assigned to Bren Quersey by Wedge Antilles. Scored a hit on Black 2.
name: Red 8 (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, if you just deployed a unique (*) character, may deploy a matching weapon on that character from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Saurin female from planet Durkteel. Bodyguard of Hrchek, a Saurin droid trader. Sai'torr will teach battle skills to those who prove themselves worthy.
name: Sai'torr Kal Fas (V)

gametext: USED: If you just drew a starship for destiny, take that starship into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve a non-[maintenance] starship into hand.
lore: A Jedi can move large objects with the power of the mind.
name: Starship Levitation (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, if opponent just played an Interrupt, may stack it here. To play any new Interrupt of same name, players must first stack it here. May place this Effect in Lost Pile (place cards here in owners' Used Pile) to retrieve a starship. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Admiral Ackbar's hit-and-fade tactics force the Imperial Navy to spread throughout the galaxy in a futile attempt to engage the Rebels.
name: Strikeforce (V)

gametext: Permanent pilot is (*]Wedge, who provides ability of 3. During a battle with opponent's [Independent] starship, may add one destiny to attrition or total power. Immune to Come With Me, Tallon Roll, and attrition < 4.
lore: Flown by Wedge Antilles as Red 2 at the Battle of Yavin. Redesignated at Endor. Rugged Incom fighter. Victory markers show its role in the attack on the first Death Star.
name: Wedge In Red Squadron 1

gametext: Deploy on table. Your total Force generation is +1. Once per game, may use 3 Force to take an Effect that has no deploy cost and deploys on another card into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May place this Effect out of play to retrieve 1 Force. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Every Ewok is taught to be protective of the younger members of their clan.
name: Wokling (V)

characteristics: \b Black Sun agent\b0, \b bounty hunter\b0, \b information broker\b0, \b thief\b0
gametext: Permanent weapon is (*] 4-LOM's Concussion Rifle (may target a character for free; target is power -1 until end of turn). Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile to draw top card from Reserve Deck.
lore: Accomplished \b thief\b0  and \b information broker\b0. Modified by Jabba to be an effective \b bounty hunter\b0. The Hutt often teams 4-LOM with other hired killers.
name: 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Power +1 while with your leader. If at a Scomp link when opponent draws destiny of: 1-3, you may activate 1 Force; 4-6, you may draw top card of your Reserve Deck; 0 or 7, you may retrieve 1 Force.
lore: Aide to Admiral Motti's staff. Foul-tempered and vindictive. Feared by other droids. A \b spy\b0  for the ISB. Secretly investigates Imperial officers whose loyalties are in question.
name: 5D6-RA-7 (Fivedesix) (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. All immunity to attrition is -3. You may not fire [permanent] weapons. If opponent just lost a Jedi or a battle, they lose 1 Force. During your draw phase, lose 1 Force or place this Effect in Used Pile. [Immune to Alter]
lore: "It has seen the end of Kenobi and will soon see the end of the Rebellion."
name: A Day Long Remembered (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. You may not play Imperial Barrier. Senators are deploy +2. Whenever you initiate a battle, may retrieve your topmost non-(permanent weapon icon), non-(maintenance cost icon) character. May place the top card of your Reserve Deck in Lost Pile to place a combat card in owner's Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: "Ben. . . Ben, please! Ben. . . Leia! Hear me, Leia!"
name: Ability, Ability, Ability (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Chiraneau may not modify your Force drains. Kuat Drive Yards is [Immune to Alter]. Unless your Senate on table, unique (*) Star Destroyers are power +2 and immunity to attrition +1. Once per game, may deploy non-[V0] Kuat Drive Yards from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: Senior Navy Commander of Death Star. Believes in technology; ridiculed the Force. Ambitious \b leader\b0. Promoted due to support of New Order, not military skills. Hates Vader.
name: Admiral Motti (V)

gametext: USED: Cancel Sense. LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Uttini Effect, and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to Do, Or Do Not). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
lore: A user of the Force can subjugate the will of others or alter the environment at a distance, as when Vader 'disciplines' those whose lack of faith disturbs him. \b OR \b0 Those who can use the Force are able to manipulate the objects around them to their advantage.
name: Alter (V) (Premiere)

gametext: Deploy on table. AT-STs and speeder bikes are power and forfeit +1. During your deploy phase, you may reveal an AT-ST or Speeder Bike from hand to take a unique (*) (Endor icon) Imperial pilot of ability < 3 (or vice versa) into hand from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Aratech Corporation sent support staff to various Imperial outposts and garrisons. Gave advanced briefings and training to biker scout personnel.
name: Aratech Corporation (V)

gametext: Power +1 on Tatooine. Once per game, during your move phase, may relocate Arica to Luke's location. During your control phase, if present at a battleground (and Luke is not), may retrieve 1 Force. Immune to Undercover and attrition < 4.
lore: Mara Jade posed as a dancer at Jabba's Palace in an attempt to complete her master's task and kill Luke. \b Musician\b0. \b Spy\b0. Unable to convince Jabba to take her on his skiff.
name: Arica (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot. During your deploy phase, may [Upload] one Pride Of The Empire. During battle, All Wings Report In and Organized Attack are canceled. While DS-61-2 piloting, immune to attrition < 5.
lore: TIE/ln assigned to pilot DS-61-2. Has 27 'flames' on cockpit, one for each Rebel kill. Control yoke has a holo of Mithels' young son, Rejili.
name: Black 2 (V)

gametext: May add DS-61-5 as pilot. During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, is instead 'hit.' If targeted by Watch Your Back!, it is a Used Interrupt. Immune to Don't Get Cocky and attrition < 4.
name: Black 5

gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, if you just deployed a unique (*) character, may deploy a matching weapon on that character from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Imperial facilities, like the Death Star and garrison bases, have blaster racks at key locations to equip soldiers with weapons like blaster rifles and thermal detonators.
name: Blaster Rack (V)

gametext: Deploy on your Imperial warrior; warrior is power +1. May target a character, creature, or vehicle for free. Draw destiny; add 1 if targeting a character, 2 if a vehicle. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if total destiny > defense value.
lore: Stormtrooper BlasTech E-11 blaster rifle. Can convert from a pistol to a rifle configuration by using extendable stock. Carries 100 shots. Military-issue only.
name: Blaster Rifle (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 8 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During your control phase, may take one Trample or Walker Barrage into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Walker Barrage total is +2. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: AT-AT commanded by the treacherous General Nevar before he was assassinated. Fortified with an extra layer of armor by the paranoid general. \b Enclosed\b0.
name: Blizzard 2 (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May move as a 'react.' During battle, if with your piloted AT-AT, may cancel game text of an opponent's character present.
lore: \b Enclosed\b0  All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). Provides flanking support to the AT-ATs of Blizzard Force. Modified for cold weather combat.
name: Blizzard Scout 1 (V)

gametext: Unless Fondor on table, may deploy -3 as a 'react.' May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2.
lore: These heavily modified battleships are used to control and direct the Trade Federation automated army. Easily identified by its array of sensors and antennae.
name: Blockade Support Ship

gametext: Permanent pilot is (*]Boba Fett, who provides ability of 3. Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Slave I's power may not be reduced by opponent. Immune to Eject! Eject! and attrition < 5.
lore: Dangerous and deadly starfighter piloted by its notorious owner. Uses combat-grade shields and sensors. Hidden weapons provide lethal surprises for Fett's victims.
name: Boba Fett In Slave I (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While at same site as a smuggler, power +3. While with opponent's smuggler or Wookiee, opponent may not draw more than one battle destiny here. Immune to attrition < number of opponent's smugglers on table.
lore: Male Trandoshan \b bounty hunter\b0. Strong but clumsy. Extremely proud and arrogant. Suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of Chewbacca and his partner Han Solo.
name: Bossk (V)

gametext: Permanent pilot is (*]Bossk, who provides ability of 2. During battle with opponent's [Independent] starship (or \ul Falcon\ul0), may add one destiny to total power or attrition. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Bossk once said of his ship, "Greeezeg uut nikek!"
name: Bossk in Hound's Tooth (V)

gametext: USED: During battle, cancel and redraw a just drawn destiny. LOST: A just drawn battle or weapon destiny is -3.
lore: If this little one doesn't pulverize you, the next one just might.
name: Close Call (V)

dark_side_text: If Any Methods Necessary just played, may take Despair into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Aiiii! Aaa! Agggggggggg! is canceled.
gametext: If you control, may use 3 Force to release a captive here. Captive Pursuit is canceled.\par If Any Methods Necessary just played, may take Despair into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Aiiii! Aaa! Agggggggggg! is canceled.
light_side_text: If you control, may use 3 Force to release a captive here. Captive Pursuit is canceled.
name: Cloud City: Security Tower (V)

gametext: May deploy as a 'react.' Permanent pilot is (*]Jendon who provides ability of 2. When deployed, may deploy a weapon on Onyx 1 from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Adds one battle destiny if with Onyx 2. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Designed to emulate Rebel starfighter advantages. Production began shortly before the Battle of Endor. Armed with laser cannons, ion cannons and missle launchers.
name: Colonel Jendon In Onyx 1

gametext: If your starting location was a system, deploy a related site (must be a battleground if the system is a non-battleground or Endor) with < 3 (Dark Side) icons and up to thee Effects that are always (Immune to Alter) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.
lore: Imperial troops remain prepared for quick deployment to seize valuable terrain.
name: Combat Readiness (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Tallon Roll is canceled. Once per turn, may reveal an unpiloted starfighter from hand to take its matching pilot character from Reserve Deck (or vice versa) and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. Your unique (*) TIEs (except Scythe Squadron TIEs) at systems may use 1 Force to relocate (as a regular move) to a system within 3 parsecs. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Being stationed at Endor during the construction of the second Death Star allowed Imperial pilots time to train in the latest starfighter combat techniques.
name: Combat Response (V)

gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles, and 4 TIEs. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During battle, may lose 1 Force to cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt.
lore: One of the Imperial cruisers that chased the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0  from Tatooine. It scanned the \ul Falcon\ul0  just before Han punched his starship to lightspeed.
name: Conquest (V)

gametext: Deploys -1 if Sidious (or Insidious Prisoner) on table. Power +1 for each Jedi here. May be targeted by Force Lightning. Once per game, if opponent just initiated battle here, may take Force Lightning or Force Push into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition <6 (<8 if with a Jedi).
lore: Serennoian \b leader.\b0 Trade Federation.
name: Count Dooku

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if Black 5). While piloting Black 5, it is maneuver +1 and he draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. If at opponent's system, instead of Force draining here, may take any one card into hand from Force pile; reshuffle.
name: DS-61-5

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. While aboard a starship, it is immune to attrition < 5. During battle at same system (twice if with your Black Squadron pilot), may cumulatively subtract 2 from a just drawn destiny. Immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Dark Lord of the Sith. Servant of Emperor. Encased in armor with cybernetic life support. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Was the best starpilot in the galaxy. Cunning warrior.
name: Darth Vader (V)

gametext: If opponent just initated battle, immediately fire a non-lightsaber, non-[permanent] weapon present (for free and each weapon destiny is +2). That weapon may fire again this battle.
lore: 275 gunners manning 60 turbolaser batteries provide a wide firing arc. Even so, asteroids are a challenge due to the sluggish recharge rates of the high-powered blasters.
name: Defensive Fire (V)

characteristics: \b Black Sun agent\b0, \b bounty hunter\b0, blaster, \b Corellian\b0
gametext: While opponent's [Reflections II] objective on table, adds one battle destiny. Permanent weapon is (*]Blaster Carbine (twice per battle, may target a character or vehicle for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
lore: Corellian \b bounty hunter\b0. Skilled athlete. Expert shot. Has worked many times for Jabba the Hutt. Carries a long-standing grudge against Han Solo.
name: Dengar With Blaster Carbine (V)

gametext: Deploy on Dooku or a [separatist] character of ability > 4. Adds 1 to this character's duel and lightsaber combat totals. May add 1 to Force Drain where present. May target a character for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
name: Dooku's Lightsaber

gametext: Permanent Weapon is Twin Blaster Cannons (may target a character or vehicle; draw destiny; add 2 if targeting a vehicle; if total destiny > defense value, target hit and you may activate 1 Force). While with another [Presence] droid at a site, adds one battle destiny.
name: Droideka

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 3 passengers. Permanent pilot is (*]Elis, who provides ability of 2. Once per game, may deploy a smuggler aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While at opponent's system, adds one [Light Side Force] icon. Immune to attrition < 5.
name: Elis in Hinthra

gametext: Deploy on table. Your Force generation is +1 at docking bays you occupy. Your docking bays controlled by opponent are battlegrounds. Once per game, may deploy Corulag or Fondor from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If Mobilization Points on table, this Effect lost. [Immune to Alter]
lore: Keeping supply routes clear allows rapid distribution of resources to where they are most required.
name: Establish Control (V)

gametext: USED: Cancel an attempt to use a character weapon to target your character of ability > 4. LOST: Use 2 Force to cancel an attempt to use a [Permanent] weapon to target your character.
lore: Han was fast. Vader was faster.
name: Force Field (V)

gametext: Once per game, choose: during battle, use 2 Force to target your Dark Jedi and opponent's character of equal or lesser ability present. Both targets are excluded from battle. OR Exchange two cards from hand with any one card from Force Pile; reshuffle.
lore: A fully-trained Sith warrior has more weapons at his disposal than just a lightsaber.
name: Force Push (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots, While piloting an AT-AT, draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise. While piloting a combat vehicle, its immunity to attrition is +2.
lore: General Maximillian Veers is the model of Imperial Army officer. Cunning, loyal and ruthlessly efficient \b leader\b0. In charge of the ground assault troops in Vader's forces.
name: General Veers (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. \ul Destiny +2 when drawn for destiny.\ul0 Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise (if with Vader or an Imperial leader, may add one instead). During battle, if you just drew a destiny < number of Imperials here, may cancel and redraw that destiny.
lore: \b Leader\b0 . Governor of Outer Rim Territories. Commanded Death Star. Helped disband Imperial Senate. Defined doctrine of rule by fear. Plotted to use Death Star against Emperor.
name: Grand Moff Tarkin (V)

gametext: May add 1 alien pilot, 6 passengers, and 1 vehicle. Deploys (even using Combat Response) and moves like a starfighter. While Bossk piloting, adds one battle destiny and immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Controlled by state-of-the-art voice-activated X10-D computers. Internal sensors and security systems monitor prisoner activity. Modified for Bossk's Trandoshan physiology.
name: Hound's Tooth (V)

gametext: For remainder of turn, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon and opponent's starship weapon destiny draws are -1. OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy an Imperial of ability < 3 (except an admiral) aboard your starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: "You've picked one up... watch it!"
name: I Can't Shake Him! (V)

characteristics: \b Black Sun agent\b0, \b bounty hunter\b, assassin
gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May use two weapons. Once per turn, if escorting a captive, may take any one card from Force Pile into hand; reshuffle. May lose 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny targeting IG-88. Immune to attrition < 5.
lore: \b Bounty hunter\b0. Went berserk upon activation. Murdered all designers at Holowan Mechanicals. IG-88's outstanding "dismantle on sight" warrant ignored by Darth Vader.
name: IG-88 (V)

gametext: Deploy on a planet site. Opponent's Force drains are -1 here (-2 if Vader controls an adjacent site).
lore: Vader's \b hologram\b0  exacts loyalty from his legions.
name: Image Of The Dark Lord (V)

gametext: Cancel Blaster Proficiency. (Immune to Sense) OR If opponent just retrieved Force, opponent must lose X Force, where X = one-half the number of cards retrieved (round down) to a mininum of 1. OR If opponent's character just lost, lose 1 Force to retrieve the topmost character of ability < 6 (except a [Maintenence] or [Permanent Weapon] card) in your Lost Pile into hand.
name: Imbalance & Kintan Strider

gametext: Deploy on table. Whenever you lose Force (except from Force drains, battle damage, or your card), may reduce loss (to a minimum of 1) by the number of battlegrounds you occupy.During battle, may place this Effect out of play to draw one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: To Imperial command personnel: The Rebellion must be crushed! Minor acts of sedition are to be ignored. The destruction of the Alliance is your primary goal.
name: Imperial Decree (V)

gametext: Deploy on table; shuffle your Reserve Deck, peek at top three cards, and stack them face-up here. During battle, may take a card here into hand to prevent all battle destiny draws from being modified or canceled (each player may draw no more than one battle destiny). [Immune to Alter]
lore: "There's nothing you could have done Luke, had you been there. You'd have been killed too."
name: Imperial Justice (V)

gametext: While with your alien leader, Jabba is immune to attrition and may not be targeted by Interrupts or weapons. May deploy one Scum And Villainy from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During battle, may use 1 Force to double the power of one other non-[maintenance] alien present.
lore: Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Male heir to Zorba the Hutt. \b Gangster\b0. \b Leader\b0  of one of the largest criminal organizations in the galaxy. Over six hundred years old.
name: Jabba The Hutt (V)

gametext: Deploy on table with any number of Defensive Shields from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Recoil In Fear until the end of your first turn.
lore: "A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack."
name: Knowledge And Defense (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Unique (*) \ul Imperial\ul0 -Class Star Destroyers draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and are immune to attrition < 4. During your deploy phase, may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. We're In Attack Position Now is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Company that produces current generation of Star Destroyers, as well as Nebulon-B Frigate. Ship yards are extremely well defended.
name: Kuat Drive Yards (V)

gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Once per game may take a TIE Defender into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While piloting, opponent may not cancel or substitute battle destiny draws here. While piloting an Imperial starfighter, it is maneuver +2 and he draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
lore: Leader.
name: Maarek Stele, The Emperor's Reach

gametext: While Luke or Emperor on table, power + 1 and she moves for free. Permanent weapon is (*]Mara Jade's Lightsaber (may target a character or creature for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
lore: Ordered to kill Luke Skywalker. Assumed the identity of a dancer named 'Arica' in order to sneak into Jabba's palace.
name: Mara Jade With Lightsaber

gametext: May deploy as a 'react.' Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. When deployed (except as a 'react'), may play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect (as if from hand).
lore: Part of limited production run of TIE defenders. Testing of the prototype defender indicated the need for a more powerful hyperdrive, which was added for this production model.
name: Onyx 2 (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Game text of non-Jedi Luke (or a lightsaber he is using) may not target aliens here. During battle, if with a smuggler, may add a destiny to attrition (+2 if with your smuggler) or make that smuggler forfeit = 0.
lore: A male Quara (or fingered Aqualish). Thug, \b smuggler\b0 and partner of Dr. Evazan. Has a poor quality cybernetic arm replacement.
name: Ponda Baba (V)

gametext: Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Power +2 if with opponent's smuggler or Wookiee. During your move phase, may use 1 Force to 'break cover' of opponent's Undercover spy at same site. Immune to attrition < 3.
lore: Spy.
name: Probot

gametext: Once per game, may take Jawa Blaster or a card with "sandcrawler" in title or gametext into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per turn, if present at a Tatooine battleground and there is more than 1 Force in opponent's Force Pile, you may use 1 Force in opponent's Force Pile.
lore: \b Jawa.\b0
name: R'tic H'weei

gametext: USED: If you just drew a character for destiny, take that card into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. LOST: Once per game, use 4 Force to deploy a Dark Jedi from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: At his peak, no one could stand up to the Dark Lord of the Sith. His superior tactics devastated those who opposed him.
name: Sith Fury (V)

gametext: \ul When drawn for destiny during a battle or duel involving a Dark Jedi, destiny +2\ul0. During your move phase, may use 2 Force to relocate a Dark Jedi (with any captives they are escorting) to same site; place this droid in Used Pile.
lore: Patrol droids utilized by the Sith. Each droid has several multispectral imaging devices and a communications package. Used by Maul to track down Amidala.
name: Sith Probe Droid (V)

gametext: USED: If opponent just initiated a battle, place a card from hand on top of Reserve Deck. LOST: Add one battle destiny where you have an AT-ST, scout, or lone Imperial of ability < 4.
lore: Imperial training allows scouts to use speed and stealth to their advantage. On Endor, they were also backed up by Commander Igar's AT-STs.
name: Sneak Attack (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, if opponent just played an Interrupt, may stack it here. To play any new Interrupt of same name, players must first stack it here. May place this Effect in Lost Pile (place cards here in owners' Used Pile) to retrieve a starship. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: The high command of the Emperor's fleet is selected as much for loyalty and obedience as for martial skills. A wise admiral knows better than to question Palpatine.
name: Something Special Planned For Them (V)

gametext: May add 1 pilot. Guri deploys -3 aboard. While Guri piloting, during any control phase may draw top card of Reserve Deck (if Chewie or Leia on table, Force Pile instead) and immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Constructed by a secretive Surronian hive craftguild. Equipped with H2-1 hyperdrive system and emergency braking jets. Guri's personal starship. Gift from Prince Xizor.
name: Stinger (V)

gametext: USED: Use 1 Force to deploy an Effect that deploys for free on table (or your side of table) and is always (Immune to Alter) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. STARTING: When drawing your starting hand, draw up to 12 cards instead of 8. Place this interrupt in Reserve Deck.
lore: "The battle station is heavily shielded and carries a firepower greater than half the starfleet."
name: Surface Defense (V)

gametext: Deploy on Death Star. During your control phase, for each battleground system controlled by your Star Destroyer within 2 parsecs of Death Star, opponent loses 1 force. Canceled if opponent controls this system.
lore: "The regional governors now have direct control over their territories. Fear will keep the local systems in line. Fear of this battle station."
name: Tarkin Doctrine

gametext: May add 2 pilots and 4 passengers. Vader deploys -3 aboard. While  Vader piloting at a battleground, maneuver +2 and you lose no Force to Uncontrollable Fury and You Must Confront Vader.
lore: Customized transport of Lord Vader. Employs advanced sensor jamming gear. Modified with enhanced tactical displays constructed to the Dark Lord's specifications.
name: Vader's Personal Shuttle (V)

gametext: Deploys -1 to Coruscant. While present with Xizor, forfeit +2 and opponent's spies may not deploy to same non-battleground site. Once per game, may use 1 Force to deploy a non-war room battleground planet site (or system) not already on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: One of Xizor's hand-picked lieutenants. Ascended as Black Sun agent from \b gangster\b0  to manager. Earned title of Vigo from old Tionese for 'nephew.'
name: Vigo (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Non-lightsaber weapons carried by your non-Dark Jedi characters may not be stolen. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site you control with a non-[Permanent] blaster present. Imperial Artillery is a Lost Interrupt. [Immune to Alter]
name: You'll Be Dead!

gametext: Power +3 while defending a battle with a spy. While with a non-frozen captive, attrition against opponent everywhere is +2. During your move phase, may use 1 Force to 'break cover' of an Undercover spy here. Immune to attrition < 3.
lore: Female ISB \b leader. Spy.\b0
name: Ysanne Isard

gametext: USED: Cancel Sense. LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Uttini Effect, and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. "The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded." \b OR \b0 The Force can be used to affect the things around a Jedi. "Always remember, your focus determines your reality."
name: Alter (V) (Coruscant)

gametext: USED: Cancel Sense. LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Uttini Effect, and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to Do, Or Do Not). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)
lore: A user of the Force can subjugate the will of others or alter the environment at a distance, as when Vader 'disciplines' those whose lack of faith disturbs him. \b OR \b0 Those who can use the Force are able to manipulate the objects around them to their advantage.
name: Alter (V) (Coruscant)
